sources.title: Metamorphosis (1990)
sources.description: Metamorphoses is a 1990 movie directed by George Eastman. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/metamorphosis-1990/

metadata.Plot: Dr. Peter Houseman is a brilliant geneticist who is working on a serum which will stop human aging, but his colleagues don't believe in his work. When his university funding is threatened by his skeptical benefactors, the doctor takes a desperate measure to justify his work. He administers the serum to himself, but the results are unexpected and horrendous.
metadata.Actors: Gene LeBrock, Catherine Baranov, Harry Cason
